rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey hey, look who it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0002
rows.name: Lao. It's been a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0003
rows.name:
It has. Are you going to introduce me to your friends?
Where's Danny and Boris?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
These are my new team members.
As for Danny and Boris...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0005
rows.name:
We had a bad run-in with a powerful indigen...
They didn't make it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0006
rows.name: I see... Hey, look, I'm sorry. I hadn't heard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0007
rows.name: It's okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0008
rows.name:
And...what's up with this onion-thing?
You using it for rations or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0009
rows.name: T-Tatsu not onion or ration![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Tatsu is Nopon!
Brave and distinguished people with long history on Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0011
rows.name: It talks?! Where'd you find this thing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Rescued him. He was about to become lunch
for some Prone—these hostile xenos we ran into.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0013
rows.name: He's agreed to serve as our guide here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0014
rows.name: Wow...okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0015
rows.name:
And you...what's your story?
Are you really as young as you look?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Sure am! 13 years old, inside and out.
I'm Lin Lee Koo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well, hello, Lin Lee Koo.
You must be something to be able to make Elma's team at 13.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0018
rows.name: All right...what about you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_JNK0010
rows.name: Accommodate

rows.label: xs04050100_SEL0011
rows.name: Introduce yourself.

rows.label: xs04050100_JNK0020
rows.name: Hesitate

rows.label: xs04050100_SEL0021
rows.name: Insist he introduce himself first.

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'm Lao Huang—I head up Pathfinder Team Belisarda.
Good to meet you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0020
rows.name: Heh, aren't we the friendly one. Well, whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0021
rows.name:
You got an interesting crew here...
but they seem capable enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0022
rows.name: I chose them personally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0023
rows.name: I figured.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0024
rows.name:
So...I heard Nelson's whole team got wiped out
by some nasty new xenos? Is that true? [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Yeah—those Prone I mentioned.
We're not sure if they're the ones that destroyed Earth,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0026
rows.name: but their tech certainly seemed advanced enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0027
rows.name: Really... We better watch our backs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0028
rows.name:
By the way, we picked up a Lifehold signal in the direction
of Noctilum. Have you or your crew come across anything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0029
rows.name: Where? Around here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0030
rows.name: I take it the answer is no.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0031
rows.name: Yeah, this is the first I've heard of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0031_2
rows.name:
We bumped into another team
and they didn't mention it either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0032
rows.name: I see. All right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0033
rows.name:
We were hoping your team might have a lead
or some more info, but no such luck, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0034
rows.name: Well, thanks anyway. We should go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0035
rows.name: Hey, hold up, hold up—you mind if I tag along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0036
rows.name: But your assignment?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0037
rows.name: We're more or less done here—we just need to report back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0038
rows.name: Well until you do, you're not "done here."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0039
rows.name:
Oh, gimme a break, Elma.
The rest of my crew can handle the paperwork.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0040
rows.name:
We're talking about a piece of the Lifehold here—
I've never even seen one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0041
rows.name:
That's way more important—
and besides, you might need the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0042
rows.name:
Finding it, or handling the indigens that get in your way.
Now c'mon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0043
rows.name: Hmmm...[ST:wait ]
